title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: The statistic presents the Number of incidents actual attempted attacks worldwide by in the Piracy in 2019 .
In 2019 , 35 % of all incidents stated they attempted attacks worldwide by .
gold: The statistic represents the total number of actual and attempted piracy attacks in the world 's most perilous territorial waters in 2019.
That year , there were six actual and attempted piracy attacks off the Venezuelan coast .
